history.text: HI there!
Hello. How are you?
Good, thank you and yourself?
So, have you seen Frozen, or rather, did your kids see Frozen:-)?
I have seen Frozen once and then only bits and pieces of it. How about you?
Did you see it?
I have seen it at leas five times:-), it came out when my daughter was six, so we watched it a lot!
What did you like about it?
It's sort of inspired by the Snow Queen by Hans Christian Andersen, I loved the music!
Especially the main Let It go Song by Demi Lovato at the end!
I know the movie is for the kids but the Let It Go theme song definitely resonates with adults, great lyrics!
My son for a school review sang a duet from the movie. The music is very inspirational.
Yes, it is! Very uplifting lyrics, makes you think of all the baggage left in the past and moving forward!
I think that Kristen Bell makes the character very real.
I also liked the animation and character portrayal, very cool designs!
I know most kids like Olaf. Who is your favorite character?
I love Elsa, so much drama and so pretty and glamorous!
How about you?
Oh, Elsa was wonderful along with her boyfriend!
And Kristoff is very humorous!
I do like that the women seemed to take the lead. What do you think of the sister?
Anna with red hair?! Very sweet and innocent, a striking contrast to her sister who is always gloomy and dramatic-they are like fire and ice!
Elsa is very dramatic.  I thought the casting was perfect.
It was nice talking to you and thanks for completing this task with me! I think we did 12 + exchanges as per instructions of the survey, I hope you have a great day!
I am not sure that we did the 12+  Was there anything else that you liked or didn't like about the movie?  I know they are making it into a Broadway show.
They are? That would be good, I know they did Beauty and the Beast and Lion King but Frozen would be amazing!
They just need to pick the right voices for the show
Definitively get the same actress/voice for Elsa!
So often they try to pick actors that resemble the movie types. I would love to see the show.
Yes!
I grown-up movie version would be good too!
Had you known the story of the Snow Queen previously to seeing this movie?
Yes, loved it as a child! One of my favorites and my grandmother read it to me all the time
I had not read it but I will now! Thank you!

uid1response.feedback: He just loved it and made me want to see the movie! Thank you.
